metadata.name: Sunniest Place 1
metadata.description:
A group of my friends play cricket on a remote beach on the Isle of Tiree, Scotland in September 2021. 

I lived in Scotland for 4 years and moved back to the US when I was 22. Last year, I went back to Scotland to see my close friends after almost 3 years away. The warmth of being reunited felt like the sun on its brightest day. 

While I took this photograph on a foggy and overcast day, it's fitting that the Isle of Tiree is considered to be the sunniest place in the United Kingdom.

Shot on 120 film.
